Salesforce Services Digital Sales Aid helps organizations efficiently deliver compelling sales presentations while on the go.

The information in this area is for internal personnel and authorized agent use only and may not be shown, printed or distributed (including email) outside of the company or used for sales or promotional purposes
Files can be added to your Personal Library in Salesforce by going to the Libraries tab and then Contribute

Would you like to move or copy the item to this playlist?
Drag content to move or copy. Tap on playlist names to edit.

Help on finding active promotion codes.

The funnel chart displays the conversion progress for your prospects from creation to convertion.You are also able to see the conversion status for the prospects created in a specific time period with the help of filter.
This order is running and can\'t be changed
Are you sure you want to delete this distribution?
Your order is created successfully, and here are the order details:
"This tool will allow to report incidents for mobile solution, recompiling device technical information del dispositivo. Please describe details for procedure in execution and the error related."

Please wait until background sync is complete before taking or viewing a survey!
This action cannot be triggered while background sync is in progress. Please try again!
Choose the assets to be audited. When an asset is audited, the last access date (audited day) is kept and saved.
WIFI detection completed. Please detect through QR code for any devices undetected.

It\'s required at least one Give and Get

This profile doesn\'t have permission to change the case in current state

Not allowed to register the Task as Cancelled!
The selected date must be later than current one.
Title and Content are required to save a note.
Application to handle this file type is not available on the device!!
You are going to reset data which will remove all local changes and force a synchronization to fetch data from backend. Are you sure?
Due to a new version of synchronization manifest full synchronization is required. Do you wish to perform it now?
Synchronization error. Please check the internet connection and try again.
You are checked in %1$s. Do you want to leave?
Error: Your user has to have a manager assigned.

Please add the following documents: 

Customer Registration: 
	• Official identification 
	• Proof of address 
	• RFC copy 

Loan Request (personal): 
	• Operating License 

Loan Request (company): 
	• Constitutive Act 
	• Official ID of legal representant 
	• Warranty 
	• Proof of address 
	• Operating License 
	• Official endorsement ID 
	• Proof of address of the guarantee
Prospect photo is missing. Do you want to add it now?
No available points for market program
Start time is after end time.
There is no equipment for this event.
Chosen equipment is not available for given time.
There are changes that have not yet been sent to server. Do you want to send or delete them?
Are you sure you want to log out?

Your users time zone is set to: \"%1$s\" but your phone is set to: \"%2$s\". This may cause unpredictable behaviour of the application. Please make sure that your phone has the same time zone as your Salesforce user.
You are too far away from your target. Please take a picture.
We cannot detect your location. Please take a picture and enter reason.
Set Current GPS Location as POC GPS Location.

Account doesn\'t have location. Please take a picture.
